dates-label: Fieldset legend for the start and end dates.
startdate-label: Form input label for the start date.
starttime-label: Form input label for the start time.
enddate-label: Form input label for the end date.
endtime-label: Form input label for the end time.
timezones-label: Fieldset legend for the list of timezone inputs.
timezone-label: Form input label for each timezone.
